creator: MartinRefseth
title: Xbox 360 USB-C Conversion
description: This project involves designing and creating a custom PCB to replace the original wired connector on an Xbox 360 controller with a USB-C connector. This eliminates the need for the long, original cable and allows for easy connection and disconnection using any USB-C cable.
steps: Design a simple PCB that connects directly to the USB-C receptacle and test it to see if it lines up with the 3D printed bracket.
Add necessary resistors to the PCB to enable USB-C to USB-C connections.
Design a new curved version of the PCB with a better fit, removing one unnecessary pin to reduce width.
Test the new PCB design and confirm it works before installing the board and enjoying the benefits of a USB-C connection on the Xbox 360 controller.
